channel.title: Blogging on RCJacH
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on RCJacH

item.title: Introduction
item.description: So after years of making various excuses to justify not picking up pen and pencil, or keyboard in fact, plus some serious degree of procrastination, I am finally convinced to start up blogging again. It took me days to actually research on the availability of the huge variety of popular blogger, comparing their pros and cons, before settling on the most useable (and coughaccessbilitycough) one. Yes, github, no ads, fast connection, and customizeable.
